mapper.select:
select tea.* , stu.sno as sno, stu.name as stu_name FROM sys_teacher tea LEFT JOIN sys_student_teacher st ON st.tea_num = tea.tno LEFT JOIN sys_student stu ON stu.sno = st.stu_num
and tea.name like concat('%', #{name} ,'%')
and tea.tno like concat('%', #{tno} ,'%')

select st.stu_num as sno , stu.`name` as stu_name , pro.*,v.state FROM sys_student_teacher st LEFT JOIN sys_proposal pro ON pro.stu_num = st.stu_num LEFT JOIN sys_student stu ON stu.sno = pro.stu_num LEFT JOIN sys_verify v ON v.file_id = pro.id WHERE st.tea_num = #{teaNum} AND pro.stu_num IS NOT NULL

select st.stu_num as sno , stu.`name` as stu_name , pap.*,v.state FROM sys_student_teacher st LEFT JOIN sys_paper pap ON pap.stu_num = st.stu_num LEFT JOIN sys_student stu ON stu.sno = pap.stu_num LEFT JOIN sys_verify v ON v.file_id = pap.id WHERE st.tea_num = #{teaNum} AND pap.stu_num IS NOT NULL
